description: Conversion of a garage into a habitable room for use as a granny annexe including associated external alteration involving the insertion of a window in lieu of the garage door opening and side extension
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: SYL/21/GH1/1 (Location Plan and Block Plan); SYL/21/GH1/2 Rev B (Existing and Proposed Ground Floor Plans); SYL/21/GH1/3 Rev B (Proposed Front and Rear Elevations); SYL/21/GH1/4 (Existing and Proposed Side Elevations)
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building and shall be consistent with those listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
| The proposed internal door connecting the granny annexe to the main dwelling (as shown on drawing number SYL/21/GH1/2 Rev B must be installed and retained for the lifetime of the development.
REASON: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining

properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).

| The development hereby permitted shall be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the main dwellinghouse at no.1 Langtry Road, Northolt, Middlesex, UB5 5JA, and not for any separate residential, industrial, commercial or business use.

Reason: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the site and to ensure that the building does not, by reason of any other activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1, 1.2, and 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), SPG 4, policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019)
